title: Vayne should not be allowed to buy Sterak's..
body:
2 life steal items and Steraks gage, and there is literally nothing anyone can do. _(although... a blindfolded one armed Yasuo would probably work still) _

We all joke around and say Vayne can 1v5 she so stupid, well this was a literal 1v5 pentakill.  

it was the most even game I've had for a long time, no one was abnormally fed, the team scores were 63/62, kills were very evenly distributed amongst everyone. We had Irelia, Xerath, Ekko, Jhin, and Nami. 
Ekko even went SO ham on her, he hit EVERYTHING, and she killed him and came out of the fight with the same amount of Hp she had at the beginning. 

She had a good kda but was far from fed. Ekko and Irelia went in first, she destroyed irelia, by the time irelia died, Xerath was there helping Ekko, he died near instantly, as he was dying Jhin and I turned up and threw everything on her, Ekko was just dead at that point, both jhin and I just evaporated, then she waited for Jhin's GA, and killed him before he could get even 1 AA off. 

Seriously, no ADC should be able to do that... no CHAMPION, should be able to do that.

Seriously life steal items should be like support Items, you can get ONE of them. 

just notice how most of the 'problem' champs are all attack-speed/lifesteal ones..

I like how QAPLA is over 75% of the comments and then goes "most people disagree with you". I'm not saying I agree, but he is just spamming by now.

Fun fact:

I had a Vayne who rushed Frozen Mallet, then Dead Man's Plate, then Sterak's Gage, then Blade of the Ruined King. She did the second most damage in the game next to my Xerath. Crazy.

http://www.the-nextlevel.com/tnl/attachment.php?attachmentid=56075&d=1272606220

i have less normal summ rift games then you and i already have 2 mastery 7 champs, git gud son

I agree with the lifesteal thing. Full life steal yas is pretty ridiculous, even Draven going lifesteal is crazy.

I like the setup league has, tanks, assassins, mage etc etc. Where having 1 of each per team means you bring a lot to the table.
But it's not just the lifesteal/sustain, it's the damage output that I think is a bit over the top. The very idea that any champion at all can demolish another champ on the same level in less than even a few seconds is just silly.

I played Aram lastnight and we got to 'late game'. I was siv and had little impact early game. But we got to late game and I had 90% crit chance, plus 50% crit damage (with ie), plus 48% crit damage with a muck about rune page I setup.

On my last death, I completed my 3rd item, bought my 4th and 5th and headed out. Went into the team fight as soon as it started (everyone above 90 percent health); 1 Q, 1 W and 4 auto attacks later. Quadra kill. In seconds. Game won.

I was like fek yeah! Then I was like this shit is so broken, I feel sorry for those guys no champ should have that power.

Isn't that was URF was designed for? Fast action, fast deaths and bugger all strategy?
welcome to league m8. Where a tank ekko can destroy anyone and can get out with the same health he had before we team fight or where a garen can do the same and still destroy anyone or everyone.

Steraks gage is a really good item for ADCs because literally EVERYTHING kills them. I'm sorry you don't know how to play against a Vayne. That's not our problem. In fact, there isn't a problem here at all.  You just don't know how to play against a Vayne and you've decided that the reason being is because of a particular item. Steraks gage is more defensive than offensive because the lifeline passive is life saving in fights where you're likely to be blown up by assassins and whatnot. Try playing ADC for once and you'll understand what I mean.  Vayne is a LATE GAME scaling champion. If you let her get to that point in the game then she will absolutely destroy you if she has good positioning. Which it looks like this particular Vayne did.

Instead of screaming and yelling because 'oh no steraks gage is broken!", look at your own goddamn play and figure out what you could have done differently.

Excuse me, but where in that post did i blame sterak's?

Show me! The title includes steraks, but the body of the post is about vayne herself, and life steal items. So next time maybe you should read the post more intently?

i never blamed steraks, infact i believe that lifesteal is the biggest issue. 

also, steraks is ONLY a defensive item, i don't know why youre trying to convince me that it is... because everyone knows that.. how could it be anything else?

Also, I do play ADC, its not my main role, but i can play it. And I'm certainly not the only one who is having problems with vayne.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LEQEZbUU,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-04T05:48:16.978+0000)

> also, steraks is ONLY a defensive item, i don't know why youre trying to convince me that it is... because everyone knows that.. how could it be anything else?
> 
> Also, I do play ADC, its not my main role, but i can play it. And I'm certainly not the only one who is having problems with vayne.

The thread title is "Vayne should not be allowed to buy Sterak's.."

If the post doesn't mention it, then you can't keep on topic in your own OP.
You make no sense.

Learn2forum...

Heard of a catchline?

Open happiness = Buy diabetes in a cup. 

Open with an eye catcher, then sell whatever you want to afterwards...

Steraks is part of the problem, but so is lifesteal, but "vayne has too much lifesteal" isnt much of an eye-catcher is it...

Learn to life....

>Steraks purely defensive item

yeah dude, it totally doesn't have any damage on it at all. i mean, it's not like it has +25% AD or anything... oh wait.

>I'm certainly not the only one who is having problems with vayne.

then what the fuck is this post even about? if you aren't having problems with her why are you complaining that your team got 1v5'd? because other than the random title that has nothing to do with the actual post, i don't see any reason you needed to post this at all, other than to show how your team got outplayed in one game vs. a lategame hypercarry.

Steraks is a defensieve item, if you want offence you do not build it, if you want survivability you do build it. That makes it a defensive item.

Dead mans plate has some damage, but that doesnt make it offensive.

And what are you talkign about? i AM having problems with vayne as are a number of other people. read what you quoted!
Im no complaining about my team getting 1v5ed, I'm complaining that an offensive champion with a score of 1 on her defensive stat, can survive the barrage of an entire team comp, regardless of how hyper carry she is, thats unbalanced.

as for the title: Steraks is strong on vayne.

Post: Vayne is too survivable.

You'd have to TRY not to see a connection there.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LEQEZbUU,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2016-09-04T10:10:43.574+0000)
>
> Post: Vayne is too survivable.

What? That means the opposite of what (I think) you intend to say. That means Vayne's opponents don't have a problem dying to her, that they easily stay alive.
What you mean to say (I think), is Vayne has too much survivability.

This is why myself, and others, get on your case.
You communicate poorly, then get angry at others telling you that what you are saying is nonsense.
You sir, are a classic case of too much time spent gaming, not enough time spent in school.

Show me the 'others' don't include people unless you can back it up.

Vayne is too survivable, makes grammatical sense for either meaning, survivability is a word that can be applied to both situations. I understand it may be confusing for you, but don't feel bad.

Do you not comprehend that almost every poster in this thread disagrees with you? That almost every response to your other posts, in other threads, is in disagreement, not just in that their opinion differs, but that your arguments are invalid or flawed.

If you can't see this, you are delusional.

I see you and 2 others disagree. along with 3 who seem to agree.

So its really 50/50.

I raise some controversial points at some times, which of course some people dont agree with. 
This point is less controvserial than usual, but a lot of people, me included struggle with vayne.

1v5 vayne was never a joke. 1v5 yasuo always was

Teemo is a problem child. He is ap and aa speed.

You fail at forums.
